com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface CarryPetService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CarryPetServiceImpl

    public CarryPetService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarryPetService

        public CarryPetService()

    • Method Detail

      • carryPet

        <P> void carryPet(P player)

        Starts the given player carry his pet if is is currently spawned. Does nothing if the pet is already getting carried.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        player

      • dropPet

        <P> void dropPet(P player)

        Lets the given player drop his pet if he is currently carrying it. Does nothing if the player isn't carrying it. Returns when the action was completed.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        player

      • throwPet

        <P> void throwPet(P player)

        Lets the given player throw his pet if he is currently carrying. Does automatically drop it and does nothing if the player isn't carrying it. Returns when the action was completed.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        player

      • getCarryPetItemStack

        <P,I> I getCarryPetItemStack(P player)

        Gets the itemstack from the carrying pet. Returns an empty optional if the player is carrying anything.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

      • isCarryingPet

        <P> boolean isCarryingPet(P player)

        Gets if the given player is carrying a pet.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

      • clearResources

        <P> void clearResources(P player)

        Clears all resources the given player may have allocated.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        player
